title: Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick, Putty Matte
descriptions:
Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This eyeshadow stick is highly pigmented, giving you a bold and vibrant color payoff. The finish is matte, perfect for creating a sophisticated and elegant look. The shade is a light taupe-pink, adding a touch of femininity to your eye makeup.

With our Crème-to-Powder formula, this eyeshadow stick glides on smoothly and effortlessly, blending seamlessly onto your eyelids. It is also waterproof and crease-proof, ensuring that your eye makeup stays intact all day long, even in humid conditions. 

Formulated with beneficial ingredients such as Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only enhances your beauty but also nourishes and protects your delicate sensitive skin. It provides antioxidant protection, improving your skin tone and texture over time.

No need for additional application tools as this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger, allowing you to easily create different eye looks and blend the color as desired. Simply coat the smudger with color, sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids, and use the smudger or your fingers to blend. For best results, remember to blend before the formula sets.

Experience the beauty and convenience of the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. Try it today and achieve stunning eye makeup effortlessly!

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in the shade Putty Matte. This highly pigmented eyeshadow stick is perfect for achieving a matte finish in a light taupe-pink color. With its crème-to-powder formula, it offers a smooth and waterproof application that is also crease-proof. 

This eyeshadow stick is made with beneficial ingredients such as Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, providing gentle care for delicate and sensitive skin. It even offers antioxidant protection, improving the tone and texture of your skin. 

No need for extra tools as this eyeshadow stick comes with a built-in smudger, making it easy to blend the color. For application, simply coat the smudger with color and sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids. Use the smudger or your fingers to blend before the formula sets. 

Experience the convenience and quality of the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. Try it now and enhance your eye makeup effortlessly!

**Description:**

Introducing the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick in Putty Matte! This eyeshadow stick is highly pigmented, providing vibrant color payoff. The finish is matte, giving your eyes a sophisticated look. The shade is a beautiful light taupe-pink, perfect for any occasion.

The Julep Eyeshadow 101 is formulated as a crème-to-powder texture, ensuring easy application and a long-lasting finish. It is also waterproof and crease-proof, so you can confidently wear it all day without smudging or fading.

Enriched with beneficial ingredients such as Vitamin C, Vitamin E, and Candelilla Wax, this eyeshadow stick not only adds color to your eyes but also provides nourishment and antioxidant protection. It is suitable for delicate sensitive skin, making it a great choice for those with sensitive eyes.

The Julep Eyeshadow 101 comes with a built-in smudger, allowing you to create different eye looks effortlessly. You can coat the smudger with color and sweep the stick directly onto your eyelids. Use the smudger or your fingers to blend the eyeshadow for a seamless finish. Remember to blend before the formula sets for the best results.

Say goodbye to complicated application tools, as the Julep Eyeshadow 101 is brush-free. With its convenient built-in smudger, you can achieve professional-looking eye makeup without any extra tools.

Upgrade your eyeshadow game with the Julep Eyeshadow 101 Crème to Powder Waterproof Eyeshadow Stick. Experience the highly pigmented, long-lasting, and easy-to-use formula that will enhance your eyes and leave you feeling confident all day long.
